comments:
Yesterday, I shutdown and restarted Eclipse a couple of times. Some team plugin
(s) were deactivated during startup because of an exception in team code. I did 
not notice this until today I went to activate a team view and it complained it 
could not restore it. Looking at the log, there was this problem...

Created an attachment (id=5426)
Complete log file

This was using build 200307090800. I'm also attaching the complete log just in 
case. This was a new install (including new workspace) done 3 days ago.

My guess is that a listener is being added at the same time the events are 
being fired. We should synchronize access to the listener collection.
I've synchronized access to the listeners
